entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • jit/performance/codequality/benchmarksgame/k-nucleotide/k-nucleotide-9/k-nucleotide-9.sh #67675
  • Native PGO: more targets #67671
  • OSR variants may not report pinned locals as pinned #67668
    7.0.0
  • Tweak profiler error messages to remove mention of COM #67664
    7.0.0
  • Discussion: Deterministic MVIDs for assemblies referencing System.Private.CoreLib across different architectures #67660
    7.0.0
  • Allow Background GC Thread Affinization #67653
  • Build: runtime checked build fails package creation #67646
  • Add header `Request-Context` to class Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers.HeaderNames #67645
  • Bitmap create new size as white image #67643
  • Make it possible to start a process suspended, and later resume it. #67642
  • Microsoft.Extensions.***.Abstractions nuget package/metapackage for use in class library #67637
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization not Deserialize inheritance class #67641
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo #67634
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #67633
  • CrossDac build is failing in internal build #67632
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2.sh #67631
  • Contract violation in GC Profiler test #67630

Closed

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.CompareRequest fails on Linux when invoked with string attribute value #66243
    7.0.0
  • Build failure: jit/CMakeFiles/clrjit.dir/cmake_pch.cxx.obj #67672
  • GetOrCreate is not atomic which is a serious issue for a cache ( eg poor perf and memory issues) #36499
    Future
  • Environment Variables not in IConfiguration #67434
  • Updating to latest VS `17.1.1` and SDK `6.0.201` breaks web application builder #66383
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build test failure: JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.Avx1 #67655
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #44486
    7.0.0
  • Aplication not found WindowsDesktop. @area-Host #67580
  • GetOrCreateExclusive() and GetOrCreateExclusiveAsync(): Exclusive versions of GetOrCreate() and GetOrCreateAsync() #36500
    Future
  • Encode UIntPtr length #67649
  • Rolling build failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.DefaultsToOffOutsideOfService #67625
  • Improve single-range IgnoreCase codegen for RegexCompiler / source generator #62647
    7.0.0
  • Determine if there are further sets to special-case in RegexCompiler / source generator #67056
    7.0.0
  • [release/preview3] Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject #67549
  • QUIC: support CipherSuitesPolicy #55378
    7.0.0
  • Regex NonBacktracking lazy loops with IgnoreCase, and repeaters aren't as lazy as they should be #63395
    7.0.0
  • Regex isn't factoring target culture into lowercasing of ranges #36147
    Future
  • [Perf] Regression in Perf_Regex.Uri_IsNotMatch(IgnoreCase, Compiled) #61786
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #61972
    7.0.0
  • Overhaul Regex's handling of RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #61048
    7.0.0
  • Regex is incorrectly handling casing of some ranges #36149
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60293
    7.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest seems to never cache a HttpClient #67629
  • Allow changing the newline sequence for indenting using Utf8JsonWriter #54715
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Refactor CharSetSolver and friends to avoid unbounded caching #67673
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix UB in CreateConstVector (strict alignment) #67669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update xharness to latest version #67667
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Various fixes for merged test runners on Mono #67665
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][interp] Fix corruption of the LMF chain #67663
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • S.S.C.Cose: Remove ECDsa and RSA overloads in favor of AsymmetricAlgorithm #67661
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Disable System.Security.Cryptography tests on x64 and x86 Emulators #67654
  • [runtime] copy updated byref nullables after invoke #67652
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix exception thrown from MsQuicStream writes when connection is aborted by peer. #67651
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete dead code #67648
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Only add placeholder pkg file if folder is empty #67647
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Add JitDump output for calls to recordRelocation #67639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources (#67608)" #67674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67658
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Pin Roslyn version for generators in .NET 7 ref pack #67599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable HandleCollectionsAsync for OSX x64 #67662
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #67610
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources #67608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm 9.x, the 11.x support is stable … #67277
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #67240
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    api-approved, area-Meta
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws #67638
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Change Regex UnicodeCategoryRanges to use spans #67576
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • log entire content to see which assertion fails #67586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Re-enable a few Regex source generator tests #67585
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use ComSmartPtr in tests #67584
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.5 #67615
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.5
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP][Mono]Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, tenet-performance, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.5
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success test #67418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #67621
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
